text:
It is the policy of the Board of Supervisors that interpreting services shall be provided at all meetings of the Board of Supervisors and of its Committees as needed. 
     The Clerk of the Board is hereby directed to include funding for interpreting services in developing the budget of the Board of Supervisors for future fiscal years. 
(Added by Ord. 352-84, App. 8/8/84; amended by Ord. 132-99, File No. 990583, App. 5/28/99)
